meanings.definition: The act of preparing items for shipment before they are sent out.
meanings.sent1: Preshipping is important to ensure all items are ready for delivery.
meanings.sent2: The preshipping of products helps streamline the shipping process.
meanings.sent3: The preshipping mix-up led to packages being sent to the wrong addresses.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail in preshipping was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The efficiency of preshipping saved time and reduced errors in shipping.

meanings.definition: The process of arranging for the transportation of goods before they are actually shipped.
meanings.sent1: Preshipping involves coordinating the logistics of product transport.
meanings.sent2: Efficient preshipping can help prevent delays in the shipping process.
meanings.sent3: The preshipping strategy ensured timely delivery of the goods.
meanings.sent4: The preshipping plan was like setting the stage for a smooth shipping performance.
meanings.sent5: The careful preshipping coordination ensured the goods reached their destination on time.

meanings.definition: To package and label items for delivery in advance of their actual shipment.
meanings.sent1: We need to preshipping these items before the end of the day.
meanings.sent2: Preshipping the products early will help avoid last-minute rush.
meanings.sent3: She preshipping the packages with precision and care.
meanings.sent4: Preshipping the goods felt like preparing a gift for delivery.
meanings.sent5: The team worked together to preshipping the orders efficiently.
